filmography.title: An Alligator Named Daisy
filmography.role_description: A charming Irishman who complicates the protagonist's life in this British musical comedy.
filmography.plot: A songwriter returning from Ireland ends up in possession of a pet alligator and tries to keep it while wooing a wealthy woman.

filmography.title: The Man Who Never Was
filmography.role_description: An Irish spy working for the Germans who tries to verify the identity of a corpse used in a British deception operation.
filmography.plot: British intelligence attempts to trick the Axis powers into believing the Allied invasion of Sicily will take place in Greece.

filmography.title: A Hill in Korea
filmography.role_description: A soldier in a small British patrol besieged by Chinese troops during the Korean War.
filmography.plot: A patrol of British soldiers in Korea is cut off from their own lines and forced to retreat while under heavy fire.

filmography.title: Island in the Sun
filmography.role_description: A young British aristocrat who engages in a controversial romance with a mixed-race woman in the West Indies.
filmography.plot: Race relations and romance cause tension in the British West Indies during the 1950s.

filmography.title: Abandon Ship!
filmography.role_description: A naval officer forced to support his captain's brutal decisions on an overcrowded lifeboat.
filmography.plot: When a luxury liner sinks, the officer in charge of a lifeboat must decide who stays and who is cast adrift to ensure the survival of the rest.

filmography.title: Seven Thunders
filmography.role_description: A British escaped prisoner of war trying to get out of Nazi-occupied Marseilles.
filmography.plot: Two British escaped POWs in Marseilles try to find a way home while avoiding the Nazis.

filmography.title: The Night Heaven Fell
filmography.role_description: A man on the run who kidnaps a young woman, leading to a passionate romance in Spain.
filmography.plot: A girl falls in love with the man who killed her uncle, believing he acted in self-defense.

filmography.title: The Bravados
filmography.role_description: A vicious outlaw and rapist being hunted by a vengeful rancher.
filmography.plot: A rancher hunts down the four outlaws who he believes raped and killed his wife.

filmography.title: Ben-Hur
filmography.role_description: The ambitious Roman tribune who betrays his childhood friend Judah Ben-Hur, leading to their legendary chariot race; Boyd's most iconic role.
filmography.plot: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent to slavery by a Roman friend in 1st-century Jerusalem, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Woman Obsessed
filmography.role_description: A rough handyman who marries a widow but clashes with her young son.
filmography.plot: A widow running a Canadian farm marries her handyman, but his harsh treatment of her son threatens their marriage.

filmography.title: The Best of Everything
filmography.role_description: A heavy-drinking editor who becomes involved with an ambitious young secretary.
filmography.plot: The professional and romantic lives of three women seeking success and love in the New York publishing world.

filmography.title: The Big Gamble
filmography.role_description: An adventurer who risks everything to drive a truck across Africa to start a hauling business.
filmography.plot: An Irishman, his wife, and his meek cousin embark on a dangerous journey to the Ivory Coast to start a trucking business.

filmography.title: The Inspector
filmography.role_description: A Dutch police inspector who risks his career to help a Jewish Holocaust survivor reach Palestine.
filmography.plot: A police inspector helps a young Jewish woman, a survivor of Auschwitz, smuggle herself into British-controlled Palestine.

filmography.title: Billy Rose's Jumbo
filmography.role_description: The son of a rival circus owner who goes undercover as a roustabout and falls for the owner's daughter.
filmography.plot: A circus owner's daughter tries to save her father's show from being taken over by a rival, unaware that the new hire is the rival's son.

filmography.title: Imperial Venus
filmography.role_description: A handsome officer who becomes the lover of Pauline Bonaparte, Napoleon's sister.
filmography.plot: The life and loves of Pauline Bonaparte, the sister of Napoleon, during the French Empire.

filmography.title: The Fall of the Roman Empire
filmography.role_description: A loyal Roman general who loves the Emperor's daughter and fights to preserve the Empire against corruption.
filmography.plot: The death of Marcus Aurelius leads to a succession crisis between his corrupt son Commodus and his loyal general Livius.

filmography.title: The Third Secret
filmography.role_description: A prominent television commentator who becomes a suspect in the mysterious death of a psychoanalyst.
filmography.plot: When a psychoanalyst dies, his daughter convinces a patient to investigate, believing it was murder.

filmography.title: Genghis Khan
filmography.role_description: A Mongol warrior and blood brother to Genghis Khan who becomes his lifelong rival.
filmography.plot: A fictionalized account of the life and conquests of the Mongol emperor Genghis Khan.

filmography.title: The Oscar
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, unscrupulous actor who steps on everyone to get an Academy Award nomination.
filmography.plot: An unscrupulous actor claws his way to the top of Hollywood, betraying everyone who helped him along the way.

filmography.title: Fantastic Voyage
filmography.role_description: A CIA agent assigned to protect a medical crew that is miniaturized and injected into a scientist's body.
filmography.plot: A diplomat is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew.

filmography.title: The Bible: In the Beginning...
filmography.role_description: The biblical king who oversees the construction of the Tower of Babel in this John Huston epic.
filmography.plot: Extensive depiction of the first part of the Book of Genesis, covering the creation of the world to the binding of Isaac.

filmography.title: The Caper of the Golden Bulls
filmography.role_description: A retired bank robber living in Spain who is blackmailed into performing one last heist during a fiesta.
filmography.plot: A former bank robber is forced to rob the bank of Pamplona during the running of the bulls.

filmography.title: Assignment K
filmography.role_description: A toy company executive who moonlights as a British spy, trying to uncover a double agent.
filmography.plot: A British spy runs a toy company as a front, but his cover is blown when his girlfriend is kidnapped.

filmography.title: Shalako
filmography.role_description: A rugged guide who leads a group of European aristocrats on a hunting safari into Apache territory.
filmography.plot: A tracker must save a party of European aristocrats who have wandered into Apache territory.

filmography.title: The Man Called Noon
filmography.role_description: A gunman who teams up with an amnesiac to find a hidden treasure and fight off bounty hunters.
filmography.plot: An amnesiac gunfighter tries to discover his identity and find a hidden fortune while being pursued by outlaws.
